title: pAdAravindamE
sahitya:
pAdAravindamE AdhAramE (unran) enrum bhavabhayam pOkkip-
parama padam aruLum bhAnukula tilaka pAvana mighum un


anupallavi

  bOdham ariyEn caturvEdam ariyEn nAthanun nAmam allAl vErariyEn


caraNam    vaLarndu vaiyamaLandadu ninaindu vanitai shApam tIra naDandadu ughandu
 vanda arakkanukkaruL kUrndarindu endai unai aham koNDEn kali tIrndEn
